post:
Tired of poor quality of service from The Other Guys? Come to IPXcore! We have great service and great true 24/7 support; you'll love us!

Our service for San Diego is out of AIS Lightwave.

Some company info: We've been up and running since May of 2011. We're running OpenVZ virtualization on our very own Dell, HP, and Supermicro -powered hardware. Each server node has its own 100mbit connection. Past-30-days support ticket mean response time: 0 Day(s) 0 Hour(s) 16 Minute(s) and 43 Second(s)

_The offer:_  
**_BronzeVZ:_**  
256mb of RAM  
64mb vSwap  
20gb of disk space   
500gb of monthly transfer  
1 IPv4 address   
10 IPv6 addresses  
San Diego, CA location  

<del>$3.99/month</del>
**_$1.75/month_** with coupon code "LETJUL2013"

Click https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=80&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3 to order! **Be sure to enter the coupon code!**

**_FYI: As outlined in the AUP/TOS ( http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ ), all new registrations MUST be made with verifiable postal address information._** Repeating your province/state in the address fields will cause your account to be suspended til you update your account information. These plans are auto-verified with Maxmind;_ if you get auto-tagged for fraud, please open a support ticket for resolution. _ All plans are also subject to manual verifications.

You are encouraged to exercise the 3-day trial period (outlined in http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ in the Billing section ) and determine if this service will be right for you.

San Diego test ip: 209.112.254.17

We also do custom plans. Please contact us with your requirements.
